about_me_text1: As a Full-Stack Developer, I bring a solid academic background from Academlo in Mexico and an upcoming certification in Software Analysis and Development from SENA in Colombia. My focus is on creating technological solutions that drive efficiency and growth for your company. With a fervent desire to learn and improve my coding skills, I am ready to contribute innovation and dedication to your team.
about_me_text2: I am a Full-Stack Developer trained at Academlo (Mexico) and soon to be certified by SENA (Colombia) in Software Analysis and Development. I focus on creating technological solutions that drive business efficiency, with a constant commitment to improving my coding skills. I am ready to bring innovation and dedication to your team.
